Posts.Content: I am 7 weeks out from my final chemo treatment and am still having problems with a fungus on my tongue. I am on my 3rd round of anti fungal medicine. Any suggestions out there from anyone?
Posts.Title: mouth fungus

Posts.Content: Kathi, I am so sorry to hear this news. Please know you are in my prayers at this time. Hugs, LoVonna
Posts.Title: I'm back, with sad news

Posts.Content: Merry Christmas Susan! I'm certainly in line for that "happy naked dance"!!!! LoVonna
Posts.Title: Merry Christmas to All
